title: HP 30b
summary: The HP 30b (NW238AA, variously codenamed "Big Euro", "Mid Euro" and "Fox"[1]) is a programmable[2] financial calculator from HP which was released on 7 January 2010.[3] The HP 30b is an advanced version of the HP's prior model HP 20b. Featuring a two line alpha numeric display, ability to input data via Reverse Polish Notation, Algebraic and normal Chain algebraic methods, and twelve digit display.
